extendedInfo.description: ZENONIAÂ® 5: Wheel of DestinyThe Definitive Action RPG Returns!Long ago, a great war was fought to restore peace and harmony to mankind. But as the years passed, greed and selfishness corrupted the hearts of man. The elite rich began to exploit the poor and great darkness came over the kingdom.Then, from the ruins of a slum village, rises a hero destined for greatnessâ¦Immerse yourself once again in the best action RPG for mobile. Defeat impossible bosses and unravel the mysteries in stunning HD!INTUITIVE VISCERAL COMBATPlay like youâve never played before as each action sequence syncs in tune with your second by second reflexes and reactions!FOUR THRILLING CLASSES OF HEROESExperience the game through four different heroes: Berserker, Mechanic, Wizard and Paladin- with the unique strengths and special moves!DYNAMIC ACTION RPG GAMEPLAYCustomize, level up and equip your hero with a massive array of options and skill charts as you delve into the mysteries of Deva Castle!FACE OFF IN GLOBAL PvPTake on challenges as you play in asynchronous PvP with characters from all over the world. Reap the rewards in the Abyss as you discover rare and legendary items!EXPLORE NEW WORLDS AND CHALLENGESWith hundreds of side quests and adventures, the story and challenges never end. Discover new items and rewards as you dive into the mysteries of ZENONIAÂ® 5!PERMISSIONSRead Contact Data is intended for the sole use of integrating the GAMEVIL LIVE Platform. The data herein is confidential and will never be distributed to the public without notice. reviews.title: Super great game !\"
reviews.comment: I love it !\" graphics are sweeeet! Gameplay very good ! 5 star for me
reviews.author: Jayjay Bolisay

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: One of the better I have played in a while. Good graphics. Easy controls. System very quick to learn.
reviews.author: William Sturgeon

reviews.title: Exellent Game
reviews.comment: This game is so fun and has perfect graphics and a great storyline and the best part is that its free
reviews.author: Kevin Adetokunbo

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Really great and awesome game, lots of depth and has that nice rpg feel.
reviews.author: Darko neznam

reviews.title: Best RPG
reviews.comment: This is the best RPG i found so far. Great storyline, nice graphic and unique class as well!
reviews.author: Hazman Halim

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good game, smooth to play, nice graphics and very fun.
reviews.author: Michael Pinon

reviews.title: So far so good..!!
reviews.comment: Its definitely a good game.. but I really hope that could at least see the gears that I equipped. It will definitely makes it more interesting just like the previous zenonia. Keep it up..
reviews.author: Kenny Ong

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very22x nice, cool, excellent game.... I\'ll give 5*
reviews.author: Uccank Cutter

reviews.title: so cooool, but
reviews.comment: this game is so cool, i really like this game , you should keep up the good work!!! but it would be better if your equipments can change the look of your character... that would be great! plz make my wish come true :)
reviews.author: Zedrick Franco

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this game, the graphics is top notch,, the game play is very good, this game is really suited for people that like playing rpg games
reviews.author: Meor yasyri ilman

reviews.title: Cool super cool
reviews.comment: Wizard and that paladin is the coolest character in zenonia
reviews.author: Emman Alfonso

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Awesome addition to the previous games, much better graphics, great leveling system, fantastic all round RPG
reviews.author: Anthony Hotker

reviews.title: Great rpg, great feel and graphics
reviews.comment: Great rpg with excellent graphics, but the game keeps crashing whenever I load a saved data. I can play the game but if I exit it, I cant continue it anymore & hav to restart from begining.
reviews.author: Kar Leong

reviews.title: Fun...
reviews.comment: An enjoyable game with a good battle system and it has quite a smooth gameplay, I only wiah that I could play it offline.
reviews.author: oezay butt

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: Controls are smooth, story line is interesting Just a very well rounded Game
reviews.author: Jonathan Chaboya

reviews.title: Love this game!
reviews.comment: Very good game. Its the most entertaining and challenging game. The best RPG action game ever!
reviews.author: Vikki The

reviews.title: Great Great Great
reviews.comment: Best game nice story just great!
reviews.author: Jerald Almonte

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: These  Game cool and the story line is also good I love it
reviews.author: Jonathan Marroquin

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Zenonia games are so amazing. They are action packed and have a good storyline. But I\'m already thinking about the next one. I want more characters, maybe 8 or 10. That\'d be great.
reviews.author: Dillon McReynolds

reviews.title: Good game but berry buggy
reviews.comment: A pretty good game but its full of bugs that mar the experience. You need an ID to play the game but you can\'t make one in game. And you meed a constant data connection. Other times the loading wheel wine leave the screen even in the middle of game play. But the game play is fun and smooth.
reviews.author: suman roy
